subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Okay, I did it.
author: Piggsy
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_000C_01C82D07.F1C88350
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

It will be interesting to hear responses in stereo.
  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: Frank Sumption 
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thu=
rsday, November 22, 2007 12:40 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Okay, I did it.
=


   Okay. I'm mkaing one kinda based onthe Mini Box, just the linear mode,=
 no sound sound chamber, no mics. I have a Walkman board I'm using as a rad=
io, which has steroe outputs, so I'll have twin speakers, and dual channel =
line output. 
   
   Frank-S




------------------------------------------=
----------------------------------
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    From=
: lisby@...
    Date: Thu, 22 Nov 2007 10:10:01 -0500
    Subject=
: Re: [EVP-ITC] Okay, I did it.

    I'm supposed to be in the lot made in =
the second week in January. I watched the demo for it last night and it see=
ms easy enough to understand, even for the technically braindead like me. T=
hat said, I'm going to have tuning issues I think, so I will be begging for=
 advice. 


    Happy Thanksgiving, Frank. Let the aliens have some turkey =
today, too!


    Ann


    On Nov 22, 2007, at 1:47 AM, Frank Sumption wro=
te:



      Well at last! I just couldn't get it together on maufacturing =
this stuff, and couldn't get all the bugs out--yet. I'm just not a business=
 person, and not even an engineer. I don't think it was for me to produce t=
hat boxes, just get the concept out there. Interesting that a non profit ou=
tfit is making it. That's not to say they give theirs away free either. 
  =
     
       I am very pleased that someone out not only comprehends how th=
e box is supposed to work, but can make it available. It is a relief to me!=

       
       Frank-S





----------------------------------------------=
--------------------------
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
        From=
: lisby@...
        Date: Wed, 21 Nov 2007 15:06:31 -0500
       =
 Subject: [EVP-ITC] Okay, I did it.


        I just preordered a minibox.
=

        In January, looks like, I will finally get my chance to play, too.=
 ;)

        Ann





-----------------------------------------------------=
---------------------
      Share life as it happens with the new Windows L=
ive. Share now!
